name: Metrophobia (Antoine Foucault)
description:
Three boys found themselves falling in the underground of an old subway station as they were happily playing.

They must find a way to get back to the surface by making their way through this scary station.

While not being pushovers, they definitively aren't experienced aventurers and their fears might get the better of them...

Arnold 

Afraid of heights, his jumping abilities are far less effective than his friends's.

Move him with the arrow keys and make him jump with the Up key.

Klaus 

Afraid of confined spaces, he can't make his way through narrow spaces.

Move him with Q and D and make him jump with Z.

Archibald 

Afraid of spiders, he will be blocked by them and their attrocious webs.

Move him with 1 and 3 and make him jump with 5 on the num pad.

Play with two of your friends on the same keyboard and try getting out of this horrific place!

Remember: Cooperation is key.

Jumping on your friends's head to get a jump boost, finding a better way for your scared friend or pushing a box to create a passage for them.
Cooperate however your can in this cramped and dusty place!
